title: The Firebird
description: A new time-slip romance adventure from award-winning, New York Times, and USA Today bestselling authorNicola Marter was born with a gift. When she touches an object, she sometimes glimpses those who have owned it before. When a woman arrives with a small wooden carving at the gallery Nicola works at, she can see the object's history and knows that it was named after the Firebrid-the mythical creature from an old Russian fable.Compelled to know more, Nicola follows a young girl named Anna into the past who leads her on a quest through the glittering backdrops of the Jacobites and Russian courts, unearthing a tale of love, courage, and redemption.
author: Susanna Kearsley
